Class GUIPart

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUIPart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GUIItem, Serializable

    public class GUIPart
extends Object
implements GUIItem, Serializable
    Contains data and methods for drawing and animating a part
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
